document.full_text: facebook is not working on opening up the world's biggest social network to children under the age of 13 in the short term, founder and chief executive mark zuckerberg said wednesday, contradicting some media reports.
document.title: zuckerberg says not opening facebook to under-13s
lines_and_colors: facebook is not working on opening up the world's biggest social network to children under the age of 13 in the short term, founder and chief executive mark zuckerberg said wednesday, contradicting some media reports.
